about_the_game:
It's a traditional jrpg game, turn-based with unique moments and a fascinating story focused on the purple light’s past.

The Story:

Two girls embark on an extremely dangerous journey to find the five elements in the Dimension Two, they end up making a new friend in this dimension.

The three girls join to explore the Dimension two, but they have no idea that the dimension two is dominated by Subtwo and Zhenya.

In this journey, Dunar ends up finding out that the Dimension Two hides secrets of the purple light’s past and she needs to solve all questions involving her past.


Key features:

• Over 30 hours of gameplay;
• 3 worlds with many regions to explore;
• Female characters to play;
• Monster bestiary to complete;
• Turn-based battles;
• Trade your items with NPCs;
• Two gameplay mechanics to play. Thays and Dunar are playable in this game.;
• Colorful environments;
• 1 bloody environment;
• Over 1 hour of soundtrack;
• Rich story and many dialogues;
• Each city has your own unique NPCs. This game doesn’t repeat NPCs;
• Two endings to explore.

name: Dunar: Dimension Two

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8.1 / 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3210 or equal
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 260X or equal
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit operating system version
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 8.1 / 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD FX-8300 or equal
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 550 4GB or equal
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit operating system version
